QuestData.Title: Mystic Mystery
QuestData.Description:
I'm sorry, I've failed to commune with Ohn'ahra. You will need someone else to fulfill the Khanam Matra's request.
Several days ago, my fellow mystics were called to Ridgewater Retreat on an urgent request from Tigari Khan. They should still be there.
Meet me outside of town. The least I can do is show you the way.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet up with Boku and travel to Ridgewater Retreat.
QuestData.RewardText: I barely escaped that ambush with my life. I'm afraid my fellow mystics weren't so lucky....
